column4: i would like to setup an intranet behind my gateway NAT... if I lock down port 80, will outgoing requests still reach there destination?
what do you mean by "set up an interanet", another NAT router?

basically I have a couple of PHP scripts for simplifying tasks for a couple "non-techs" for a headless server and i want everyone behind the gateway NAT to see port 80 but no one outside the NAT can access the web server
